meanings.definition: A weight class in professional wrestling and boxing for competitors weighing between 200 and 230 pounds.
meanings.sent1: The cruiserweights showcased their skills in the ring.
meanings.sent2: Fans enjoy watching cruiserweights compete in the wrestling matches.
meanings.sent3: The cruiserweights decided to have a friendly competition outside the gym.
meanings.sent4: In the world of wrestling, cruiserweights are like agile warriors.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered as the cruiserweights performed their high-flying moves.

meanings.sent1: The cruiserweights trained hard to stay in top shape.
meanings.sent2: She aspires to be one of the cruiserweights in the upcoming tournament.
meanings.sent3: At the gym, the cruiserweights joked about their favorite wrestling moves.
meanings.sent4: The cruiserweights stood out with their speed and agility in the match.
meanings.sent5: Being a cruiserweight requires dedication and skill in the ring.

meanings.definition: A type of ship used for cruising or patrolling.
meanings.sent1: The navy deployed cruiserweights to patrol the coastline.
meanings.sent2: The luxurious cruiserweights offered extravagant amenities for the passengers.
meanings.sent3: During the cruise, the cruiserweights entertained the guests with live music.
meanings.sent4: The sleek design of the cruiserweights made them ideal for long voyages.
meanings.sent5: The captain maneuvered the cruiserweights through rough waters with expertise.
